title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4063.4 - Claiming price in program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4063.4 - Claiming price in program

State Regulations

The claiming price of each horse in a claiming race
shall be printed on the program. All claims for the same horses shall be for
the amount so designated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4063.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
